web.Add_Credits:
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Add_Credits]
                @username VARCHAR(10),
                @server VARCHAR(50),
                @credits int,
                @column int,	
                @type int					
                        AS
                        BEGIN
                                IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT memb___id FROM [DmN_Shop_Credits] WHERE [memb___id] = @username AND server = @server)
                                BEGIN	
                                        INSERT INTO [DmN_Shop_Credits] (memb___id, server) VALUES (@username, @server);
                                END
                                IF (@column = 1)
                                BEGIN
                                        IF (@type = 1)
                                        BEGIN
                                                UPDATE [DmN_Shop_Credits] SET [credits]=[credits]+@credits WHERE [memb___id]=@username AND server = @server;		
                                        END
                                        IF (@type = 2)
                                        BEGIN
                                                UPDATE [DmN_Shop_Credits] SET [credits]=[credits]-@credits WHERE [memb___id]=@username AND server = @server;
                                        END
                                END	
                                IF (@column = 2)
                                BEGIN
                                        IF (@type = 1)
                                        BEGIN
                                                UPDATE [DmN_Shop_Credits] SET [credits2]=[credits2]+@credits WHERE [memb___id]=@username AND server = @server;
                                        END
                                        IF (@type = 2)
                                        BEGIN
                                                UPDATE [DmN_Shop_Credits] SET [credits2]=[credits2]-@credits WHERE [memb___id]=@username AND server = @server;
                                        END
                                END	
                                IF (@column = 3)
                                BEGIN
                                        IF (@type = 1)
                                        BEGIN
                                                UPDATE [DmN_Shop_Credits] SET [credits3]=[credits3]+@credits WHERE [memb___id]=@username AND server = @server;
                                        END
                                        IF (@type = 2)
                                        BEGIN
                                                UPDATE [DmN_Shop_Credits] SET [credits3]=[credits3]-@credits WHERE [memb___id]=@username AND server = @server;
                                        END
                                END	
                        END

account.WZ_CONNECT_MEMB:
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[WZ_CONNECT_MEMB]
                                @uid varchar(20),
                                @server varchar(20),
                                @uip varchar(20)
                        AS
                        BEGIN
                                BEGIN TRANSACTION
                                SET NOCOUNT ON
                                IF EXISTS (SELECT memb___id FROM MEMB_STAT WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) WHERE memb___id = @uid)
                                BEGIN
                                        UPDATE MEMB_STAT SET ip = @uip, connectstat = 1, servername = @server, ConnectTM = (GETDATE()) WHERE memb___id = @uid
                                END
                                ELSE
                                BEGIN
                                        INSERT INTO MEMB_STAT (memb___id,ip,connectstat,servername) VALUES (@uid, @uip, 1, @server)
                                END

                                IF EXISTS (SELECT account FROM dmncms.dbo.DmN_IP_Log WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) WHERE account = @uid AND ip = @uip)
                                BEGIN
                                        UPDATE dmncms.dbo.DmN_IP_Log SET last_connected = (GETDATE()), login_type = 0 WHERE account = @uid AND ip = @uip
                                END
                                ELSE
                                BEGIN
                                        INSERT INTO dmncms.dbo.DmN_IP_Log (account, ip, last_connected) VALUES (@uid, @uip,GETDATE())
                                END

                                IF(@@Error <> 0 )
                                        ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
                                ELSE
                                        COMMIT TRANSACTION
                                SET NOCOUNT OFF
                        END
account.WZ_CONNECT_MEMB_MUDEVS:
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[WZ_CONNECT_MEMB]
                                @uid varchar(20),
                                @server varchar(20),
                                @uip varchar(20),
                                @hwid varchar(100)
                        AS
                        BEGIN
                                BEGIN TRANSACTION
                                SET NOCOUNT ON
                                IF EXISTS (SELECT memb___id FROM MEMB_STAT WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) WHERE memb___id = @uid)
                                BEGIN
                                        UPDATE MEMB_STAT SET ip = @uip, connectstat = 1, servername = @server, ConnectTM = (GETDATE()), HWID = @hwid WHERE memb___id = @uid
                                END
                                ELSE
                                BEGIN
                                        INSERT INTO MEMB_STAT (memb___id,ip,connectstat,servername,hwid) VALUES (@uid, @uip, 1, @server, @hwid)
                                END

                                IF EXISTS (SELECT account FROM dmncms.dbo.DmN_IP_Log WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) WHERE account = @uid AND ip = @uip)
                                BEGIN
                                        UPDATE dmncms.dbo.DmN_IP_Log SET last_connected = (GETDATE()), login_type = 0 WHERE account = @uid AND ip = @uip
                                END
                                ELSE
                                BEGIN
                                        INSERT INTO dmncms.dbo.DmN_IP_Log (account, ip, last_connected) VALUES (@uid, @uip,GETDATE())
                                END

                                IF(@@Error <> 0 )
                                        ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
                                ELSE
                                        COMMIT TRANSACTION
                                SET NOCOUNT OFF
                        END
account.WZ_DISCONNECT_MEMB:
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[WZ_DISCONNECT_MEMB]
                                @memb___id varchar(20)
                                AS
                                BEGIN	
                                SET NOCOUNT ON
                                        DECLARE @find_id varchar(20)
                                        DECLARE @ServerName varchar(50)
                                        DECLARE @ConnectTM smalldatetime	
                                        SET @find_id = 'NO'	
                                        SELECT @find_id = S.memb___id, @ServerName = s.ServerName, @ConnectTM = s.ConnectTM FROM MEMB_STAT S INNER JOIN MEMB_INFO I ON S.memb___id Collate Database_Default = I.memb___id Collate Database_Default WHERE I.memb___id Collate Database_Default = @memb___id Collate Database_Default
                                        IF(@find_id <> 'NO')	
                                        BEGIN		
                                                IF EXISTS(SELECT id FROM dmncms.dbo.DmN_OnlineCheck WHERE memb___id = @memb___id AND ServerName = @ServerName)
                                                        BEGIN
                                                                UPDATE dmncms.dbo.DmN_OnlineCheck SET OnlineMinutes = OnlineMinutes+(DATEDIFF(mi, @ConnectTM, GETDATE())), TotalTime = OnlineMinutes+(DATEDIFF(mi, @ConnectTM, GETDATE())) WHERE memb___id Collate Database_Default = @memb___id Collate Database_Default AND ServerName Collate Database_Default = @ServerName Collate Database_Default
                                                        END
                                                ELSE
                                                        BEGIN
                                                                INSERT INTO dmncms.dbo.DmN_OnlineCheck (memb___id, ServerName, OnlineMinutes, TotalTime) VALUES (@memb___id, @ServerName, 0, 0);
                                                        END

                                                UPDATE MEMB_STAT SET ConnectStat = 0, DisConnectTM = GETDATE() WHERE memb___id Collate Database_Default = @memb___id Collate Database_Default
                                        END
                                END
account.DmN_Check_Acc_MD5:
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[DmN_Check_Acc_MD5]
                    @username VARCHAR(10),
                    @pass VARCHAR(20)				
                            AS
                            BEGIN
                                    DECLARE 
                                            @hash BINARY(16),
                                            @result varchar(20);
                                            EXEC master..XP_MD5_EncodeKeyVal @pass, @username, @hash OUT;
                                            IF EXISTS(SELECT memb_guid FROM MEMB_INFO WHERE memb___id Collate Database_Default = @username Collate Database_Default AND memb__pwd = @hash)
                                            BEGIN
                                                    SET @result = 'found';
                                            END
                                            ELSE
                                            BEGIN
                                                    SET @result =  'notfound';
                                            END
                                            IF(@result = 'notfound')
                                                    SELECT @hash AS result
                                            ELSE
                                                    SELECT @result AS result
                            END
